animals.name: Dolphin
animals.fact: Dolphins are super smart! They can recognize themselves in mirrors and have their own names. They use echolocation to 'see' with sound, sending out clicks that bounce off objects to help them navigate and find food.
animals.funFact: Dolphins sleep with one eye open!

animals.name: Elephant
animals.fact: Elephants never forget! They have amazing memories and can remember friends for many years. They are the largest land animals.
animals.funFact: Elephants can smell water from 3 miles away!

animals.name: Tiger
animals.fact: Tigers are the largest cats in the world! Each tiger has unique stripes, just like human fingerprints. They love swimming!
animals.funFact: A tiger's roar can be heard from 2 miles away!

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.fact: Giraffes have super long necks to reach high leaves. They only need to sleep for about 30 minutes a day!

animals.name: Penguin
animals.fact: Penguins can't fly, but they are amazing swimmers! They can dive deep into the ocean and hold their breath for up to 20 minutes.
animals.funFact: Penguins can jump 6 feet out of the water!

animals.name: Parrot
animals.fact: Parrots are colorful birds that can mimic human speech. They lived in tropical rainforests.

animals.name: Butterfly
animals.fact: Butterflies taste with their feet! They migrate thousands of miles and help pollinate flowers.

animals.name: Ladybug
animals.fact: Ladybugs are small beetles that are often red with black spots. They help farmers by eating microscopic pests.

animals.name: Turtle
animals.fact: Turtles have a hard shell that protects them like a shield. Sea turtles spend most of their lives in the ocean.

animals.name: Chameleon
animals.fact: Chameleons can change color to blend in or show their mood! Their eyes move independently.
animals.funFact: Their tongue is longer than their body!
